function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Calculating the reproductive number in the context of disease transmission","Impact":"Inaccurate calculation may underestimate the contagiousness of a disease, leading to ineffective control measures.","Mitigation":"Use accurate and up-to-date data for variables and parameters in the calculation, consider the impact of spatial and demographic factors.","Technologies":"Data analysis tools, spatial modeling software, demographic analysis tools.","People":"Researchers, epidemiologists, public health officials.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations."}]}
